work.description: RVCM is a mission-driven digital transformation firm focused on Agile DevSecOps practices that deliver scale, speed, and security for government agencies and enterprises facing continually evolving IT needs and cyber security threats.
highlights: Efficiently managing software products and ensuring successful execution and delivery.
Serving as the primary point of contact for customer issues and outcomes.
Oversee technical team efforts to ensure alignment with stakeholder objectives
Effectively managing the team's workload and ensuring positive outcomes.
Facilitating the removal of any team blockers to maintain smooth operations.
Engaging with key stakeholders to align technical tasks appropriately.
Managing sprint planning meetings, sprints, backlogs, and roadmaps to ensure successful project execution.
work.name: RVCM
work.summary: Served as a Technical Project Manager for multiple projects in RVCM's portfolio.

work.description: Dark Wolf Solutions is an IT consultancy firm that offers software development, system engineering and management solutions.
highlights: Enterprise-level Scrum Master facilitated task flow across Value Stream Scrum of Scrums
Coached Scrum Masters on Agile framework execution
Facilitated communication between teams and business/technical leadership
Coached business and technical leadership teams on Agile philosophies, framework, and culture
Facilitated business leadership & technical leadership backlog grooming
Removed enterprise wide blockers
Helped map dependencies of all work, across all product teams
work.name: Dark Wolf Solutions
work.summary: Scrum Lord, Scrum Knight, Scrum Master, and DevSecOps Engineer at Platform One

highlights: Team goals included replacing costly legacy lab solutions with Lab as a Service (LaaS) solution that provided internal customers with immutable test infrastructure.
Success of initial program ignited interest in developing similar solution beyond development into test and delivery.
Work with stakeholders and customers to develop continuous integration platform pipeline using Gitlab CI, HashiCorp Packer, Ansible, and OpenSCAP.
work.name: Raytheon Technologies
work.summary: Developer and Scrum Master for DevSecOps Platform Engineering team.

highlights: Refactored Group Policy testing and deployment to ensure delivery of versioned security baselines to production systems.
Brought system baselines into current Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG) recommendations.
Successfully migrated team code base to GitLab ensuring accurate change history and version control.
Performed additional role as Scrum Master for automation team.
Worked as servant-leader to facilitate value delivery and remove developer roadblocks.
work.name: Raytheon Technologies
work.position: Senior Cybersecurity Engineer II / Scrum Master
work.summary: Cybersecurity Engineer specializing in compliant automation

highlights: Developed stand-alone PowerShell based solutions to deploy and verify the mitigation of vulnerabilities in legacy Windows systems.
Accelerated deployment of modern Windows systems as a PowerShell Desired State Configuration developer.
Worked with customer prioritize legacy system vulnerability remediation while minimizing resources required to meet customer needs.
work.name: Raytheon Technologies
work.summary: Designed Cybersecurity solutions for the NORAD Integrated Tactical Warning/Attack Assessment and Space Support Contract (NISSC).

work.description: Microsoft Federal brings the mission understanding, engineering expertise, and leading technology to drive outcomes in a new era of government.
highlights: Specialized in Windows, Server, Active Directory and Virtualization technologies with deep understanding and ability to deliver timely and creative incident resolution focused on root cause analysis prevention, and subsequent knowledge transfer.
Successfully managed Microsoft IaaS resources for major political campaign event resulting in system-wide stability and security.
work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Platform PFE for DoD customers working primarily with Navy, MDA, and USMC customers.

highlights: Explore and test new Windows versions and features for inclusion in the enterprise.
Supported Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager (SCCM) infrastructure.
Engineered, tested, and implemented disaster recovery solution using Hyper-V Replica.
Led team in server deployments during SCCM Distribution Point upgrades and documented process improvements.
work.name: Lockheed Martin
work.summary: Develop and test Windows images for enterprise deployment.

highlights: Led team in efforts related to PowerShell scripting and automation.
Implemented numerous improvements to standard operating procedures resulting in efficient and standardized processes that reduced workflow bottlenecks.
Developed and performed integration and system tests for Active Directory service upgrades.
Tested ongoing software upgrades and enhancements with a focus on directory service quality and stability.
work.name: Lockheed Martin
work.summary: Established role in the company as an expert in Group Policy and Active Directory delegation.

highlights: Maintain smooth operation of computer systems.
Duties include active directory and group policy management, SMS and WSUS administration and software deployment, Operating System, and application support.
Worked with Dept. of Defense and USAF programs to evangelize new operating system deployment and testing.
Achieved the highest percentage of upgraded systems and test participants among participating sites.
Developed role-based security procedures using administrative and technical controls that stabilized network while enhancing system security.
Consolidated costly legacy systems to VMware.
